searchableProductInfo.title: Cailin patchwork clutch
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Jimmy Choo can always be relied on for statement accessories, and this 'Cailin' clutch doesn't disappoint. Expertly crafted from a patchwork of crocodile, python and lizard, it also features a leopard-print calf hair wrist cuff. The haute hues are inspired by the '70s disco era, making this standout piece perfect for evening.Shown here with: Ashley Pittman necklace, KAUFMANFRANCO top, Lanvin belt, Giambattista Valli skirt, Ala√Øa shoes.
